Sequence Information.Source: amino acid appending, Derivative of GF-17, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Thathapudi NC, Callai-Silva N, Malhotra K, Basu S, Aghajanzadeh-Kiyaseh M, Zamani-Roudbaraki M, Groleau M, Lombard-Vadnais F, Lesage S, Griffith M.2024
Literature.Title: Modified host defence peptide GF19 slows TNT-mediated spread of corneal herpes simplex virus serotype I infection.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (89.47%) toGF-17GF-19 = GF-17 + KL.Activity: it inhibited herpes simplex virus serotype I (HSV-1).MOA:virus: probably block viral entry.
